full_threads.body:
Hi Natasha,

Confirming we have updated the DFS line-spacer to be plain lines.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig
Joel Maligalig assigned to Heath Maguire
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath
Thanks for making those changes.
There are some pages that feature a line-spacer with the DFS logo - see attached screen shot. Can these be changed to plain line pls?
Thank you

Natasha Adams
M: 0438 009 596
E: natasha@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:natasha@dressedforsale.com.au>
T: 08 8333 3443
7 Myer Court, Beverly SA
www.dressedforsale.com.au <http://www.dressedforsale.com.au/>

>
> ﻿ Hi Danielle,
>

>
> Thanks and speak soon,
> Heath Maguire
> CREATIVE DIRECTOR

>> Cc: Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:dan@advantagestyling.com.au>>, Georgia Sloane <georgia@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:georgia@advantagestyling.com.au>>, Natasha Adams <natasha@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:natasha@dressedforsale.com.au>>, Lexie Parsons -- Accounts <lparsons@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:lparsons@dressedforsale.com.au>>, Kristy Gordon <kristy@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:kristy@dressedforsale.com.au>>
>> Subject: Re: review of Novari website

>>

>> Thanks and speak soon,

>>> On 10 Aug 2021, at 11:23 am, Danielle Gerlach <dan@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:dan@dressedforsale.com.au>> wrote:
>>>
>>> Hi Team,
>>>
>>> My notes after review;
>>>
>>>
>>> Home Page
>>> Phone number buttons-M&A left, SYD right. I don’t like the layout of this, unbalanced and cluttering the Novari logo. Where else could the phone number buttons sit?
>>> I like the colour scheme and us of light at the top and dark at the bottom.
>>> Property Styling Services
>>> “How we differ” I’m not happy that this still promises-Same day quote, next day delivery.
>>> Our Services
>>> Only mentions trade as Pre-Sale preparation-Not sure if this should be more specifically using the word Trade or Projects.
>>> Our Process
>>> Wheel Logo and colour palate is still old DFS Logo.
>>> About Us
>>> Team-Stylist profiles reference DFS
>>>
>>> Thank you,
>>> Danielle Gerlach-DFS Melbourne
>>>
>>>
>>> From: Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:dan@advantagestyling.com.au>>
>>> Sent: Tuesday, 10 August 2021 9:41 AM
>>> To: alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au <mailto:alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>; 'Dan Evans' <dan@fullsteamconsulting.com.au <mailto:dan@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>>
>>> Cc: Georgia Sloane <georgia@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:georgia@advantagestyling.com.au>>; Natasha Adams <natasha@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:natasha@dressedforsale.com.au>>; Danielle Gerlach <dan@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:dan@dressedforsale.com.au>>; Lexie Parsons -- Accounts <lparsons@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:lparsons@dressedforsale.com.au>>; Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
>>> Subject: RE: review of Novari website
>>>
>>> Hi Alban and Dan E,
>>>
>>> The team at Dressed for Sale is doing a final review of the www.novaricollective.com.au <http://www.novaricollective.com.au/> staging website before we go live next week.
>>>
>>> Now might be a good time for you to review the SEO of the new website to ensure all the goodness you guys had created with DFS over the last 6 months will come across (apart from the authority of the domain itself which we can’t do much about initially).
>>>
>>> Some further notes:
>>> Not too fussed about the SEO for Sydney to be perfect for launch, as we will be keeping our Sydney site going. Our main objective is SEO for Adelaide and Melbourne as we will turn off the dresseforsale.com.au <http://dresseforsale.com.au/> website pretty soon after we go live with the above site.
>>> The team is reviewing it mainly for formatting and aesthetic. The assumption is that Wolf IQ has transferred all the pages across.
>>> Do the backlinks come across automatically or do we need to start building them again?
>>>
>>> Also, can you please assist us with execution of the changeoever when we push GO (i.e. when we turn off www.dressedforsale.com.au <http://www.dressedforsale.com.au/> and we need to put in place all the relevant redirects etc). If there is a charge for this to DFS can you please let us know an estimate for this work?
>>>
>>> Regards
>>> Dan
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>> Dan Gerber
>>> Managing Director
>>> Advantage Property Styling
>>>
>>> Follow us on:
>>> <image001.png> <https://www.facebook.com/AdvantageStyling/> <image002.png> <https://www.instagram.com/advantagestyling/>
>>>
>>> M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611
>>> Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019
>>> www.advantagestyling.com.au <http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/>
>>>
>>> <image003.jpg> <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cdan%40advantagestyling.com.au%7Ce602e50b521c43e4660408d89d805221%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637432521746992000%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=FFlqQ3stkAIq7QO9Yd4J5LLimH1kxxYL2wJIw%2BaQehY%3D&reserved=0>

>>> From: Dan Gerber
>>> Sent: Monday, 9 August 2021 4:52 PM
>>> To: Natasha Adams <natasha@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:natasha@dressedforsale.com.au>>; dan@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:dan@dressedforsale.com.au>; Kristy Gordon <kristy@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:kristy@dressedforsale.com.au>>; Rachel Patane <rachel@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:rachel@dressedforsale.com.au>>; Lexie Parsons -- Accounts <lparsons@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:lparsons@dressedforsale.com.au>>; Jenny Luxton <jenny@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:jenny@dressedforsale.com.au>>; Jessica Jeffs <jessica@dressedforsale.com.au <mailto:jessica@dressedforsale.com.au>>
>>> Cc: Georgia Sloane <georgia@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:georgia@advantagestyling.com.au>>
>>> Subject: review of Novari website
>>>
>>> Hello DFS legends!
>>>
>>> Georgia will soon be providing you with access to the www.novaricollective.com.au <http://www.novaricollective.com.au/> staging website. This website is currently offline and needs a login to access it.
>>>
>>> A few notes on the website:
>>> It is an exact replica of the current DFS website in terms of layout, wording, images etc.
>>> It has been rebranded with our new Novari Collective colours and logo. I’m not convinced it is using our new wonderful logo colour scheme in the best way so please let us know what you think.
>>> Georgia has added some Sydney references in where needed so it represents all 3 states.
>>>
>>> Can you please review and provide any comments in the next 48 hours so we can prepare for the branding changeover.
>>>
>>> There will be plenty of time to amend and update the website post launch but we want to have something decent that we are super proud of on day 1.
>>>
>>> Cheers
>>> Dan
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>> Dan Gerber
>>> Managing Director
>>> Advantage Property Styling
>>>
>>> Follow us on:
